feed.title: Welcome to the path!
feed.subtitle: This is just a corner stone for my begining in the long journey to eudaimonia.

entry.title: The first post of many!
entry.content:
I started this page with a simple purpose: to have a public place where a story can be told. A story about self discovery and struggle for something worthwhile. Of all the things to be the center of all of this, i have chosen to goal of being a better programmer.

Soon i will add pages to my current projets that i am working on.
entry.summary: I started this page with a simple purpose: to have a public place where a story can be told. A story about self discovery and struggle for something worthwhile. Of all the things to be the center of all of this, i have chosen to goal of being a better programmer.
